overview: Famous Agoraphobic Woman Tells All!  was originally shot in Portland, Oregon in 1999. The miniDV tapes the film was recorded on were lost, then found, then lost, then found again. The film tells the wacky story of Zoey and her mad quest for fame, which she finally achievies after a Sunset Boulevard-type twist.
title: FAMOUS AGORAPHOBIC WOMAN TELLS ALL!
